pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Discord Gaming Messenger.
This package installs Discord Messenger. It allow the installation of stable, public test build (ptb), and alpha (canary) versions, managed by use flag.
Note that since this does not track specific packages and release numbers of Discord, it may be necessary from time to time to clean all Discord software in /usr/portage/distfiles and perform an: ebuild {discord ebuild} digest to update portage with newer versions of the software.
This can be identified when Discord states an update is available.
Eventually, the canary dependencies will need to be moved into the other versions of the release.
Consult the @README@ for documentation: <https://github.com/hasues/gentoo-overlay#readme>
